data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: There are many factors influencing what schools may look like in twenty years: unprecedented global forces and unforeseen technologies and paradigm shifts in ways students want to learn and teachers want to instruct. I predict that the future of education will require educators to be more entrepreneurial, collaborative, creative, and innovative. Additionally, learners will be even more tech-savvy, demanding, confident, and focused as consumers of education. In addition to having more project-based instructional models, major changes will take place in the core curriculum. Contrary to the old-school traditions housed in English, math, social studies, and science, curricula in twenty years will reflect the skills mandated by emerging economies and technologies. Skills such as coding, design, sustainability, and financial literacy will have to be integrated and taught into classroom curricula. (128字)
data.referenceText: In what ways do you think education would be different 20 years from now?
data.referenceTranslate: 你认为20年后的教育在哪些方面会有所不同?
